name: Green and Black Batik Silk Scarf (8 x 54)
description: 100% Hand-printed Silk

reviews.comment: Absolutely beautiful! The silk quality is amazing and the batik print is so vibrant. Perfect gift for my mother.
Authentic Malaysian batik. The craftsmanship is top-notch. Highly recommend!
Very nice scarf, though slightly smaller than expected. Still love it!

name: Yellow Wau Bulan
description: Traditional Malaysian kite souvenir.

reviews.comment: Perfect souvenir! The colors are bright and it looks amazing on my wall. Great Malaysian heritage piece.
Beautiful traditional kite. Good quality for the price.

name: Erhu
description: Traditional Chinese string instrument with a beautiful tone, commonly used in Chinese orchestras and traditional music performances.

reviews.comment: Excellent instrument! The sound quality is superb. My music teacher was impressed with the craftsmanship.
Authentic erhu with rich, warm tones. Perfect for traditional Chinese music practice.
Great quality erhu. Takes some time to tune but worth it!

name: Traditional Muruku
description: Crunchy and savory traditional Indian-Malaysian snack made from rice flour

reviews.comment: Reminds me of my grandmother's homemade muruku! Perfectly crunchy and not too oily.
Best muruku I've bought online! Fresh and crispy. Will order again.
Delicious snack! Great with tea. Came well packaged.
Authentic taste! Better than most shops. Highly recommend!
Very crispy and flavorful. A bit spicy for me but still enjoyable.
Perfect for Deepavali celebrations! My family loves it.
Traditional recipe done right! Tastes just like from Little India.
Great snack for parties. Everyone loved it!
My kids can't stop eating these! Will definitely reorder.
Excellent quality! Fresh and crunchy, not stale at all.
Good muruku. Slightly oily but still tasty.
Brings back memories of home! Worth every cent.
Addictive! Can't stop munching. Perfect tea time snack.

name: Ornamental Keris
description: A decorative replica of the traditional Malay dagger with a wavy blade and intricately carved wooden sheath.

reviews.comment: Beautiful piece! The carving on the sheath is incredibly detailed. Makes a stunning wall display.
Impressed by the craftsmanship. This is a true work of art representing Malay heritage.
Gorgeous keris! Slightly pricey but worth it for the quality.

name: Congkak Board Set
description: Traditional Malay counting game carved from solid wood. Complete set includes board and marble seeds.

reviews.comment: My kids love playing congkak! The wood quality is excellent and smooth. Great way to teach traditional games.
Nice traditional game set. Brings back childhood memories!

name: Guzheng
description: Chinese plucked zither with 21 strings. Creates beautiful, flowing melodies characteristic of traditional Chinese music.

name: Kompang Drum
description: Traditional Malay hand drum used in weddings and cultural celebrations. Made with genuine goat skin.

name: Sape
description: Traditional Borneo lute instrument from the Orang Ulu people. Known for its soothing and mystical sound.

name: Kuih Bahulu
description: Light and fluffy Malaysian sponge cakes. Traditional festive treat with a subtle egg and vanilla flavor.

reviews.comment: Tastes just like what my mom makes during Raya! Soft and fluffy, not too sweet. Love it!
Fresh and delicious! Perfect with afternoon tea.

name: Dodol
description: Sweet and chewy Malaysian confection made from coconut milk, palm sugar, and rice flour. A festive favorite.

reviews.comment: Authentic dodol! Rich coconut flavor and perfect chewy texture. Highly recommended!
Sweet and delicious! Reminds me of festive seasons at home.

name: Sambal Ikan Bilis
description: Crispy anchovies cooked in spicy sambal sauce. Perfect accompaniment to nasi lemak.

name: Pewter Photo Frame
description: Handcrafted Malaysian pewter photo frame featuring traditional floral designs. Made with 95% tin.

reviews.comment: Elegant and beautifully crafted! Makes a wonderful gift. The pewter quality is exceptional.
Excellent Malaysian craftsmanship! Heavy and solid, not flimsy at all.
Beautiful frame! The floral design is intricate and unique.

name: Wayang Kulit Shadow Puppet
description: Traditional Javanese leather shadow puppet, hand-carved and painted. A unique piece of Southeast Asian art.

name: Dizi Bamboo Flute
description: Traditional Chinese transverse flute made from bamboo. Includes membrane and carrying case.

name: Kek Lapis Sarawak
description: Premium layered cake with intricate patterns. Vacuum sealed to retain moisture.

reviews.comment: Absolutely delicious! The layers are so beautiful and the taste is amazing. Worth every penny!
Best kek lapis I've ever had! Moist, flavorful, and beautifully packaged.
Beautiful cake! The intricate layers are impressive. Great for gifting.

name: Ipoh White Coffee (3-in-1)
description: Authentic charcoal-roasted white coffee instant packs. 15 sachets per pack.

reviews.comment: Best white coffee! Smooth, aromatic, and not too sweet. I buy this every month!
Authentic Ipoh white coffee taste! Perfect for breakfast. Love it!
Good coffee, rich flavor. Convenient instant packs for the office.

name: Gula Melaka
description: Pure palm sugar blocks. Essential ingredient for traditional desserts.

name: Biskut Tambun
description: Famous Penang mung bean biscuits. Boxed with individual wrapping.

name: Acar Buah
description: Traditional pickled fruits with spices and dried chilies. Preserved in a jar.

name: Keropok Keping
description: Dried fish crackers from Terengganu. Ready to be fried at home.

name: Kuih Tart Nanas
description: Buttery pastry topped with sweet and tangy pineapple jam. Comes in a sealed plastic jar.

name: Biskut Bangkit
description: Traditional tapioca cookies that melt in your mouth. Fragrant with coconut milk.

name: Handwoven Songket Sampin
description: Luxurious traditional Malay fabric woven with gold and silver threads. Perfect for formal occasions and weddings.

reviews.comment: Stunning songket! The gold threading is exquisite. Perfect for my son's wedding.
Excellent quality! Traditional craftsmanship at its finest.
Beautiful fabric, though quite expensive. But worth it for special occasions!

name: Labu Sayong Clay Pitcher
description: Authentic gourd-shaped clay water pitcher from Kuala Kangsar, Perak. Traditionally used to keep water cool.

name: Sarawak Ceramic Beads Necklace (Green)
description: Hand-painted ceramic beads featuring traditional Orang Ulu motifs. A colorful accessory representing Borneo heritage.

name: Vintage Nyonya Tiffin Carrier
description: Traditional enamel food carrier (Mangkuk Tingkat) adorned with colorful floral Peranakan designs.

name: Handmade Rattan Basket Bag
description: Eco-friendly fashion statement woven from natural rattan vines. Durable and stylish for daily use.

name: Mengkuang Woven Mat
description: Traditionally woven floor mat made from Mengkuang leaves. Cool to the touch and perfect for picnics or home decor.

name: Angklung Set
description: Traditional musical instrument made of bamboo tubes attached to a bamboo frame. Creates a resonant pitch when shaken. Standard diatonic scale.

reviews.comment: Bought this for my music class. The students love it! Good quality bamboo and accurate tuning.
Nice sound, but one tube was slightly loose. Easily fixed with glue though.

name: Gambus (Malay Oud)
description: Short-necked lute popular in Malay folk music like Ghazal. Handcrafted from hardwood with a pear-shaped body.

reviews.comment: Excellent craftsmanship. The tone is deep and resonant. A beautiful instrument for Ghazal performance.

name: Rebana Ubi
description: Large traditional Malay drum famously used in harvest festivals in Kelantan. produces a deep, booming bass sound.

name: Sompoton
description: Traditional wind instrument from Sabah, made from a dried gourd and bamboo pipes. Unique to the Kadazandusun culture.

reviews.comment: Authentic Sabahan souvenir! It actually plays well, not just for decoration.

name: Indian Tabla Set
description: Pair of twin hand drums from the Indian subcontinent. Essential for Hindustani classical music. Includes cushions and tuning hammer.

reviews.comment: High quality skins and heavy weight copper bayan. Sounds professional.
Good starter set for beginners. Fast delivery.
